channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-8012] hadoop-daemon.sh and yarn-daemon.sh are trying to mkdir and chow log/pid dirs which can fail
item.description:
Here's what I see when using Hadoop in Bigtop:

$ sudo /sbin/service hadoop-hdfs-namenode start
Starting Hadoop namenode daemon (hadoop-namenode): chown: changing ownership of `/var/log/hadoop': Operation not permitted
starting namenode, logging to /var/log/hadoop/hadoop-hdfs-namenode-centos5.out

This is a cosmetic issue, but it would be nice to fix it.
item.summary: hadoop-daemon.sh and yarn-daemon.sh are trying to mkdir and chow log/pid dirs which can fail

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I've committed this and merged to 23. Thanks Roman!

HADOOP-8012. hadoop-daemon.sh and yarn-daemon.sh are trying to mkdir and chown log/pid dirs which can fail. Contributed by Roman Shaposhnik
